snippet.title: My Little Universe - Announcement Trailer - Steam and Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
https://say.games/en?utm_source=social&utm_placement=yt

Stranded on a barren moon, with nothing but your tools, fuelless ship, and celestial powers of creation, you are destined to recreate what was once lost and be the hero of your own Little Universe! 

MY LITTLE UNIVERSE is coming to Steam and Nintendo Switch in Autumn 2023.

Wishlist the game on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2328750/My_Little_Universe/

#mylittleuniverse #mlu 

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/saygames.fb
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/saygames.by
